com.swirl

Class WifiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swirl.Manager
      • com.swirl.WifiManager

  • public class WifiManager
extends Manager
    The WifiManager monitors the state of wifi networks and is notified by the operating system when the user changes his wifi connection. If the network's SSID is in a whitelist of "interesting" networks, then the BSSID is sent to the platform for resolution. If resolved, then the system posts enter and exit events as needed.

    An instance of this class is loaded and started by the library. You do not interact with this class directly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WifiManager.WifiDwellEvent
      This event is posted as the device is dwelling in a given AP
      class  WifiManager.WifiEnterEvent
      This event is posted when a monitored network is entered.
      class  WifiManager.WifiEvent
      WifiEvent is the base class for all events posted by the WifiManager.
      class  WifiManager.WifiExitEvent
      This event is posted when a monitored network is exited.
